descriptionlist.description:
This package depends Alderis package from Chariz: https://chariz.com/

Add customizable pasteboard shortcuts to your iPad keyboard! If you own an iPhone, check out DockX.

Supporting iPadOS (13.0+).

Available shortcuts:
-Select
-Select All
-Select Line
-Select Paragraph
-Select Sentence
-Copy
-Paste
-Cut
-Undo
-Redo
-Beginning of Document
-Ending of Document
-Capitalize
-Lowercase
-Uppercase
-Delete
-Bold
-Italic
-Underline
-Cursor Left
-Cursor Right
-Cursor Up
-Cursor Down
-Dismiss Keyboard
-Auto-Correction
-Auto-Capitalization
-Keyboard Input Type
-Define Word
-Shell Command
-Insert Text
-Previous Word
-Next Word
-Line Start
-Line End
-Start of Paragraph
-End of Paragraph
-Start of Sentence
-End of Sentence

Third-party tweak shortcuts:
-CopyLog*
-Translomatic*
-Wasabi*
-Pasithea*

Available gestures:
-Single tap
-Long Press
-Double Tap

and many more default long press gesture for each shortcut

Go to setting page to manage your shortcuts.

To support development: https://www.paypal.me/udevs

*Package needs to be installed for shortcut to show.

changelog.change:
NEW FEATURES:
-15 new shortcuts!
-Added double tap gesture
-Added third-party tweak shortcuts: CopyLog*, Translomatic*, Wasabi* & Pasithea*
-Added Prev. & Next Word shortcuts
-Added Line Start & End shortcuts
-Added Start & End of Paragraph shortcuts
-Added Start & End of Sentence shortcuts
-Added Select Line, Select Paragraph & Select Sentence shortcuts
*Package needs to be installed for shortcut to show.

FIXES & IMPROVEMENTS:
-Fixed not being able to add shortcuts in "Manage Shortcuts" section when only single shortcut is enabled
